item.title: Report X-2024071419
item.description:
Report X-2024071419

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-26T18:15:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-17
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED WET FROM BOX. ITEM WAS LEAKING FROM LID PLACE IN A HAZMAT BAG. I PLACE THIS HAZMAT INTO A HAZMAT BAG AND INTO HAZMAT DRUM. SHIPPERS NEED TO ENSURE THAT ALL LIDS ARE SEAL TIGHT BEFORE SHIPPING PACKAGS.
